name: Slammy Bears Hunt For His Hibernation Honey
name_original: Slammy Bears Hunt For His Hibernation Honey
description:
My first ever finished game for the Cosy Fall Jam 2022!

This is my first finished project, it might not have a lot to it, but I'm over the moon I've finished a game! I've never done a game jam before and have really learnt a lot! I went for a children's book feel as I knew I was going to make something simple!

Help Slammy Bear find enough honey to keep his belly full when he trades his place outside to inside a nice cave to hibernate!

Gameplay, art and sounds by Reu Durell
